pkgmetadata.longdescription: # py-expiring-dictPython dict with TTL support for auto-expiring caches# Install```bashpip install expiring-dict```# Usage## Class Level TTL```pythonfrom time import sleepfrom expiring_dict import ExpiringDictcache = ExpiringDict(1) # Keys will exist for 1 secondcache["abc123"] = "some value"assert "abc123" in cachesleep(1)assert "abc123" not in cache```## Key Level TTL```pythonfrom time import sleepfrom expiring_dict import ExpiringDictcache = ExpiringDict() # No TTL set, keys set via [] will not expirecache["abc"] = "persistent"cache.ttl("123", "expired", 1) # This will expire after 1 secondassert "abc" in cacheassert "123" in cachesleep(1)assert "abc" in cacheassert "123" not in cache```
